ygData.subject: Re[2]: Selos Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: I was highly impressed with Mindspring s dialup service.  Were the throughput of my cable modem not so much better, I would still be dialing up, because
ygData.messageBody:
I was highly impressed with Mindspring's dialup service. Were the
throughput of my cable modem not so much better, I would still be
dialing up, because Mindsprings packet loss was consistently less than
1%...

Meanwhile, @home's packet loss is... lets call it 'special'... I just
haven't been able to make myself go back to regular old slow surfing
speeds though... <shrug>

Derrick
aka Drae, Veeshan


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Selos Accelerando
Author: eqbards@onelist.com at internet
Date: 7/15/99 1:48 PM


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

That's what I figured. That's why it takes me 30-45 minutes to get to Paw
from Qeynos without a drum. My conection sux. Can I get some isp
suggestions from the other bards out there? Even though I live in a
metropolitan suburb, my neighborhood doesn't have DSL or cable modems
available yet. My current isp is...AOL. I tried AT&T but the ping was even
worse than my usual 500 or so. You can send suggestions to me directly at
Dean_Kimes@... to avoid spamming the list. Thanks!!!

Kitasi
